description:
Nagisa is threatened by Ayano`s presence. She works even harder than ever before, but can`t seem to pull out of her slump. Then, their new coach Tachibana takes action...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Meat`s the Best After a Workout!
Rien de mieux que la viande après le sport !
Undou no Nochi no Niku wa Kakubetsussu!
運動の後の肉は格別ッス!
